bugs.title: pam_ssh: Did not properly drop root privileges prior executing ssh-agent [epel-all]

bugzilla.short_desc: pam_ssh: Did not properly drop root privileges prior executing ssh-agent [epel-all]

blocked.short_desc: pam_ssh: privileges not dropped properly before executing ssh-agent

long_desc.thetext:
It was found that pam_ssh, PAM module for use with SSH keys and ssh-agent,
did not properly drop root SGID privileges prior executing the ssh-agent
authentication agent. A local attacker could use this flaw to potentially
escalate their privileges.

References:
[1] https://bugzilla.novell.com/show_bug.cgi?id=665061

Proposed patch:
[2] https://bugzilla.novell.com/show_bug.cgi?id=665061#c3

CVE request:
[3] http://www.openwall.com/lists/oss-security/2011/06/06/3

This issue affects the versions of the pam_ssh package, as present within
EPEL-4 and EPEL-5 repositories.

--

This issue affects the versions of the pam_ssh package, as shipped with
Fedora release of 13, 14, and 15. Please schedule an update.

Created pam_ssh tracking bugs for this issue

Affects: epel-all [bug 711171]
Affects: fedora-all [bug 711172]

This is an automatically created tracking bug!  It was created to ensure
that one or more security vulnerabilities are fixed in affected Fedora
versions.

For comments that are specific to the vulnerability please use bugs filed
against "Security Response" product referenced in the "Blocks" field.

For more information see:
http://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Security/TrackingBugs

When creating a Bodhi update request, please include the bug IDs of the
respective parent bugs filed against the "Security Response" product.
Please mention CVE ids in the RPM changelog when available.

Bodhi update submission link:
https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/new/?type_=security&bugs=711170

Please note: this issue affects multiple supported versions of Fedora EPEL.
Only one tracking bug has been filed; please only close it when all
affected versions are fixed.


[bug automatically created by: add-tracking-bugs]
